description: Explore how Gemini's Nifty Gateway can revolutionize open source software funding using blockchain and NFTs. Understand the potential opportunities and challenges of integrating NFTs for sustainable financial support in the open source ecosystem.
keywords: Open Source Funding, Gemini's Nifty Gateway, NFTs, Blockchain, OSS Sustainability, Financial Solutions, Technological Innovation, Tokenized Contributions
title: Bridging Open Source Funding with Gemini's Nifty Gateway
